segments.text: Hello . Can I talk to David ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One second , please . ( a few seconds later , the receiver comes back and says ) Hello ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . David is out to lunch right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay . I ’ m his wife . Could you tell him to call me back when he returns ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Does he know where to call you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , thanks . Please tell him to call my cell-phone number .
segments.speaker: S1
